I can't add a payment method

To add a payment method, please follow these steps:

1. Access the Billing Section in your account.
2. Click 'add payment method.'
3. Provide your credit card information and save.

If you're still having trouble, make sure that your credit card details are correct and that there are no restrictions from your bank. If the issue persists, you might want to contact your bank or try using a different card.

For more detailed guidance, you can refer to our Billing Guide here: [Billing Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17821681919757-Billing-Guide).
